'''''"Rulers of the Chizhang Mountains"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]]s {{Enemy|Geovishap|text=Ruler of the Chizhang Mountains: Yiji}} and {{Enemy|Geovishap|text=Ruler of the Chizhang Mountains: Tianyu}}.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Rulers of the Chizhang Mountains can be found to the east of [[Chizhang Wall]].
<gallery>
Achievement Rulers of the Chizhang Mountains Location.png|Map Location
Achievement Rulers of the Chizhang Mountains Location Context.png|Location Context
</gallery>
* Yiji will be {{Color|Pyro}}, while Tianyu will be {{Color|Cryo}}.

==Trivia==
* Yiji and Tianyu are two mythical beasts described in {{W|Classic of Mountains and Seas}}:
** Yiji is strange beast that resembles a black bear, with a red mouth, red eyes and a white tail. It not only has the power of nine cows and two tigers, but also exudes blazing flames all over its body.
** Tianyu has eight heads and eight faces, a tiger body, eight legs and eight tails, a green-yellow color, spits out clouds and mist, and controls water.
